title: Amy Adams, 45, goes make-up free in a grey hoodie and leggings as she heads out for a yoga session
text:
She's wowed audiences with her incredible portrayals on both the small and big screen.

But Amy Adams was a little more low key on Thursday when she went make-up free to attend a relaxing yoga class.

The Man Of Steel star, 45, wore a grey hoodie and three quarter length leggings as she headed to the fitness session.

Normal: Amy Adams, 45, went make-up free in her hoodie and three quarter leggings on Thursday as she attended a relaxing yoga class

Namaste: The Man Of Steel star, 45, carried a brown leather bag and her yoga mat into the studio

Amy wore her fiery red hair tied up in a bun and her eyes covered by a pair of dark shades.

She carried a brown leather tote bag, while a hefty yoga mat in her left hand was a sign of the rigorous session ahead.

The Vice star's outing comes after she stepped out with her daughter Aviana in West Hollywood earlier this week.

Amy and her husband Darren Le Gallo, 45, welcomed Aviana in May 2010.

Confident: Amy looked naturally beautiful as she headed off to her class in her relaxed get-up

The actress recently picked up her first nomination for an Emmy award.

She portrayed alcoholic reporter Camille Preaker in the critically acclaimed HBO series Sharp Objects based on the novel of the same name by Gillian Flynn.

The series follows Camille who after recently being discharged from a psychiatric hospital returns to her hometown to investigate the murder of a teenage girl.

Emmy nomination: Darren escorted wife Amy to the Primetime Emmy Awards last month in Los Angeles where she was nominated for her work in the HBO series Sharp Objects

For her portrayal of Camille, Amy was nominated for Outstanding Lead Actress In A Series Or Movie at the 71st Primetime Emmy Awards held last month in Los Angeles.

The award went to Michelle Williams for her portrayal of Gwen Verdon in the FX series Fosse/Verdon.

Amy met Darren in 2001 at an acting class.

The got married in 2015 during a small ceremony at a friend's house near Santa Barbara, California.
description: A relaxed Amy, 45, went make-up free, with her fiery red hair tied up in a bun and her eyes covered by a pair of dark shades.
